amendment.description: An amendment to increase funds for the Department of the Treasury Debt Restructuring account by $210,000,000 for FY 2000 and by $179,600,000 for FY 2001.

action.text: Mr. Callahan raised a point of order against the Pelosi amendment (A001). Mr. Callahan stated that the amendment sought to legislate in an appropriations bill. The Chair sustained the point of order.
